result.execSummary:
The defendant Percy A. WATKINS was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess MDMA with intent to deliver (>3-10g), a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(hm)2.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes:
To Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department from case no: 18 CF 12.

Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  The balance remaining at release from prison to be paid as a condition of extended supervision at a rate determined by the supervising agent.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Maintain full-time employment, schooling or a combination of both.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Have no contact with any known drug users or dealers.
AODA assessment and follow through counseling.

State moves to delete the penalty enhancer on count 3, second and subsequent offense.   Motion granted.  
Count 3 - Possess MDMA with Intent to Deliver - No contest plea.   Convicted.   State moves to dismiss and read in counts 1 and 2.   Motion granted.   Court orders a pre-sentence investigation report to be completed by DOC.   Report is due 08-15-16.   Sentencing hearing is set for 08-29-16 at 11:00 a.m.   Court orders a DNA sample.

ADDRESS INFO for Percy A. WATKINS
Current: 911 State Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 12-01-2015)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States

$1,000.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.   
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail Bond

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 12-09-15 at 9:30 a.m.   
Minutes.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of possess MDMA with intent to deliver, possess cocaine with intent to deliver and possess THC as repeater. The matters are continued for initial appearance on 11-30-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, have no contact with Lashawn Owens, David Komorosky and Damen Watkins and no possession of any firearms.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Minutes.
RE:  Possess THC-2nd offense, on 11-23-15.
